title: (x) Lee Broom Neoneon geometric sans - Futura {Yves}
content:
Hello,

It is my first post,  
I’m french, sorry for my english,  
Hello Everybody:)

I find the name of this font ?

Many Thanks,

 [‹ (x) Jaws movie logo - custom drawn {Stephen}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080108031401/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39431 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Vila Hartt semiserif - Invoice {Marten F} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080108031401/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39435 "Go to next forum topic")
author: fotozo

comments.content: Is not helvetica is very very very different
Avant Garde Gothic bold with a white stroke added.

It’s not quite Avant Garde either, but it’s probably a better solution than Helvetica was. Sad thing is I just identified another ID as Avant Garde right before I saw this one.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-avant-garde-gothic/bold/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080108031401/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-avant-garde-gothic/bold/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-avant-garde-gothic/bold/")

If you like Helvetica and Avant Garde, try Chalet (this is not Chalet either, nor is it Paralucent or Folio).

- Lex
Thanks i try chalet is very cool
Oh lookie, Yves ID’d it. It’s Futura everybody.

\> It’s Futura everybody.

Is it? Which one? The ones I looked up didn’t match.
